title: Феникс
overview: Ivan Kolesnikov leads a quiet life in the town of Kirovsk, where he owns a small cafe. When bandits suddenly appear in his establishment, Ivan, protecting his wife, becomes an unwitting killer of the raiders. The trouble does not come alone: soon serious people come to him under the leadership of Andreas, the son-in-law and right hand of the crime boss of Primorsk - Kostas. Andreas knows the secret of Kolesnikov, who has been impersonating another person for many years...
